original: 義陽新野人，蜀漢官員，鄧芝之子。魏滅蜀時，劉禪命鄧良、張紹、譙周等攜印綬，向鄧艾請降。晉代魏後，官至廣漢太守。
text: Yiyang Xinsavage, Shuhan official, son of Deng Zhi. When Wei defeated Shu, Liu Chan ordered Deng Liang, Zhang Shao, Qiao Zhou and others to bring the seals and ask Deng Ai to surrender. After Wei in the Jin Dynasty, he became the prefect of Guanghan.
